title: Sell Bruichladdich Scotch
metaDescription: Sell your Bruichladdich whisky. We buy Black Art, Octomore, and older vintages. Direct offers.
heroSubhead: We buy Bruichladdich Black Art and limited releases.
introParagraph: Bruichladdich is known for its wide variety of experimental and artisanal whiskies. We purchase the Black Art series, older vintages (20+ years), and the first editions of their unpeated, Port Charlotte, and Octomore lines. Sell your rare Bruichladdich collection directly to us.
whatWeDoNotBuy: Standard Bruichladdich Classic Laddie (unless older batch)
conditionFactors: Tin condition is important (Laddie tins bruise easily)
pricingFactors: Black Art Edition (Edition 01.1 through 04.1 are prized)

faqs.question: Which Black Art is most valuable?
faqs.answer: The early editions created by Jim McEwan (01.1, 02.1, 03.1, 04.1) are typically the most valuable.

faqs.question: Do you buy Port Charlotte?
faqs.answer: Yes, we buy older and limited Port Charlotte releases (like PC5, PC6, PC7, PC8) and cask exploration series.

faqs.question: Do you buy the Valinch releases?
faqs.answer: Yes, these distillery-exclusive hand-filled bottles are very collectible.

faqs.question: Do you buy Yellow Submarine?
faqs.answer: Yes, the Yellow Submarine (Worm Tub) releases are highly sought after.

faqs.question: Does the tin matter?
faqs.answer: Yes, Bruichladdich packaging is distinct. A dented tin can slightly reduce the offer.

faqs.question: Do you buy the Octomore futures?
faqs.answer: Yes, we look for the original Octomore futures and early releases.
